name: Little fight
description: 《Little fight》 is a magic theme, heroes battle, heavy athletics, turn-based SLG game. Proficient in the technical, strategic requirements, followed by competitive game skills design, strategy skills diversification: can be forced, dizziness, treatment, crawling, combat range, stealth, clear skills and so on.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp,vista or 7 Processor: 1G Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 GB available space
